summary: A comprehensive unit-test suite that validates the UniSpeechSat speech model's configuration, initialization, forward behavior, and training/inference across CTC, sequence classification, and x‑vector tasks, including handling of masks, token embedding resizing, and gradient tracking.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability and correctness of the UniSpeechSat model for production speech processing pipelines, ensuring it meets functional requirements and performs as expected in various training and inference scenarios.
